name: Fearless Smile, Kurumi
text: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of those cards. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: "Hurricane Children" Kaguya & Yuzuru
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if all of your characters are 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》, you may pay the cost. If you do, perform the following effects 1 time each in any order. If you do not pay the cost, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "You may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room." "Deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)

name: Beyond Her Extended Hand, Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Airship Fraxinus" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Deal 1 damage to your opponent 2 times." "Deal 4 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)

name: Starry Night, Yuzuru
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +3500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage.

name: A New Battle, Kaguya
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +500 power. 【AUTO】 When your climax with in its trigger icon is placed on your climax area, this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 All of your other "A New Battle, Yuzuru" get +2000 power." 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: A New Battle, Yuzuru
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "A New Battle, Kaguya", this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When your climax with in its trigger icon is placed on your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return the revealed card to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0) 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters you have ×500.

name: Dignified Appearance, Yuzuru
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if all of your characters are 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》, this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if ""【El Kanaf】"" is in your climax area, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Starry Night, Kaguya
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Two As One, Kaguya" or "Two As One, Yuzuru" in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into their stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.

name: Seductive Invitation, Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Mystery Hot Pot Party, Kaguya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: We went all out this time. Everyone tossed in the food they love best.

name: Moment at Home, Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Finding the Impostor, Kotori" in your waiting room, and put it in the stage position this card was in. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Is the hamburger steak ready yet, big brother?

name: Finding the Impostor, Kotori
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if "Moment at Home, Kotori" is in your waiting room, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Moment at Home, Kotori" in your waiting room, and put it in the stage position that this card was in.
flavorText: Going on four dates in a single day isn't such an easy schedule.

name: Lunchtime, Kotori
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, this card gets +6000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, you may draw 2 cards. If you do, choose 2 cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, you may choose 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: My brother made it for me!

name: Two As One, Yuzuru
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, your opponent's characters cannot be returned to their hand by your effects. 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "Starry Night, Kaguya", if you have 4 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock. 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, if you have 4 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and put it on the top of their deck.

name: Two As One, Kaguya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "Starry Night, Kaguya", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "We Are First!" is in your climax area, and you have 4 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to 2 cards from among them, put them on the top of their deck in any order, put the rest into their waiting room, and this card may get the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 During this card's attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step."

name: Mystery Hot Pot Party, Yuzuru
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 2 of your 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Innocent Bud, Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters you have ×500.

name: Dignified Appearance, Kaguya
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may reveal up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. If you reveal 1 or more cards, choose up to 1 character with "Kaguya(耶倶矢)" or "Yuzuru(夕弦)" in its card name among those cards, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: A Zoo Only For Me, Kotori
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power.

name: Power of Retrospection, Kurumi
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Zaphkiel, Yod!

name: Make Me Fall For You, Shido
text: 【CONT】 If there are 8 or more markers underneath this card, this card gets +17000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, and your waiting room has 1 character with "Tohka(十香)" in its card name, 1 other character with "Kotori(琴里)" in its card name, 1 other character with "Origami(折紙)" in its card name, 1 other character with "Yoshino(四糸乃)" in its card name, 1 other character with "Kaguya(耶倶矢)" in its card name, 1 other character with "Yuzuru(夕弦)" in its card name, 1 other character with "Miku(美九)" in its card name and 1 other character with "Natsumi(七罪)" in its card name, you may put the top 8 cards of your deck face up underneath this card as markers. 【AUTO】 At the end of your opponent's turn, put all markers underneath this card into your waiting room.
flavorText: Enough that I can't wait to kiss you.

name: Battle to Determine the Yamai
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)

name: Airship Fraxinus
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: "【El Kanaf】"
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)

name: We Are First!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavorText: Yuzuru: "Pride. Leave this to Kaguya and me."

name: For Everyone's Sake, Yoshino
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Sharing Halloween Treats" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have 4 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Choose 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand." "You may choose 1 of your opponent's level 1 or higher characters. If you do, your opponent chooses 1 level X or lower character in their waiting room, and exchanges them. X is equal to the level of the character you chose -1."

name: "〈Haniel〉" Natsumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if ""【Kaleidoscope】"" is in your climax area, and you have 4 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, perform the following action. "[(1) Put 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from your hand into your waiting room] You may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets the following 2 abilities until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects." "【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -2 soul."" You may deal 1 damage to your opponent afterwards. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Shame, Natsumi
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, if there are 3 or more markers underneath this card, put all markers from underneath this card into your waiting room, and you may put the top card of your deck into your stock. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, choose up to 1 card among the remaining cards, put it face up underneath this card as a marker, and put the rest into your waiting room."
flavorText: Argh! Why do I have to be like this?!

name: Taking Into Custody for Observation, Natsumi
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "For Everyone's Sake, Yoshino", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Don't look at me!

name: Pajama Party, Tohka & Yoshino
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in your back stage, your other characters in the left and right positions of your center stage get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: New Power, Origami
text: 【CONT】 "Basic Realizer" get -1 cost while in your hand. 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 [(1) 【REST】 this card from 【STAND】] When the battle opponent of your other "Spirit Who Kills Spirits, Origami" becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Chance Meeting, Natsumi
text: 【AUTO】 Change [Return this card to your hand] At the beginning of your main phase, if you are level 3 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character in your hand, and put it in the stage position that this card was in. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: Big Sis here wants to ask you a little something.

name: Spirit Who Kills Spirits, Origami
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If this card is in your center stage, all of your 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "Received Power" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)

name: Decisive Moment, Origami
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, put it into your stock. (Otherwise, return the revealed card to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0) 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Clothes That'd Make One Happy, Origami
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand.
flavorText: Please don't, Itsuka!

name: Composure of an Adult, Natsumi
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax with in its trigger icon is placed on your climax area, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step." 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Mystery Hot Pot Party, Yoshino
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, all of your characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."

name: Glamorous Body, Natsumi
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 [【REST】 1 of your other 【STAND】 characters] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your stock.

name: Picking an Outfit, Yoshino
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Come, this way.

name: Suspicious, Natsumi
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Picking an Outfit, Yoshino" in your back stage, this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Picking an Outfit, Yoshino" in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage.
flavorText: Those guys, saying all those lies…

name: "【Shiryon】" Yoshino
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 2 cards, choose 2 cards in your hand, put them into your waiting room, and put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock.
flavorText: Shido, you've got to reach her!

name: Seductive Proportions, Origami
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +500 power. 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.

name: Spirit Power Supplement, Origami
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: It's turtle, scorpion, and seal body parts boiled in energy drink.

name: True Form, Natsumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your stock has 5 or less cards, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck, your opponent chooses 1 event or character among those cards, you put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Can You Find Me? Natsumi
text: 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: It's time…

name: A Zoo Only For Me, Yoshino
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters among those cards ×1000.

name: The Body Doesn't Lie, Origami
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Shido: "Origami, you're..."

name: Promise to Keep a Secret, Natsumi
flavorText: And, well, Yoshino couldn't let it go, so we followed you.

name: My Little Shido
text: 【REST】 1 of your 【STAND】 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters. If you do, choose 1 of the following effects and perform it. "[(1)] You may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled) "Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn. Put this card into your stock." "Choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavorText: Here we go. Your choices, everyone!

name: Sharing Halloween Treats
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Yoshino: "Ah!"

name: "【Kaleidoscope】"
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: Received Power
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 level 1 or lower character in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Metatron!

name: Our Feelings, Tohka & Miku
text: 【CONT】 If your hand has 5 or more cards, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to the open middle position of your center stage.

name: Changing the Past, Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 level 0 or lower characters from among them, put them in separate positions of your stage as 【REST】, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Now, come to me, Zaphkiel!

name: To Protect Her Brother, Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Return this card to your hand] When ""【Gungnir】"" is placed on your climax area, if you have another 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level 0 or lower 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character in your waiting room, and put it in any position of your stage.

name: Mystery Hot Pot Party, Kotori
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a card with in its trigger icon, choose 1 of your 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I-Isn't that wonderful, Shido?

name: "【Yod Bet】" Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, choose 1 of your ""〈Metatron〉" Origami", and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, if ""【Yod Bet】"" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Didn't I tell you already? It's hopeless, no matter what you try.

name: Inverse 〈Princess〉, Tohka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, put them on the top of your deck in any order, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] When this card attacks, if you have 4 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the bottom 4 cards of your opponent's deck into their waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Answer me, you. Where am I?

name: At the Rooftop After School, Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: My goodness. Big boys should watch where they sleep, dear Shido.

name: Cultural Festival, Kurumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or put into your waiting room from the stage, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

name: Taking a Break, Tohka
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if there is a climax in your opponent's climax area, choose 1 of your 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters in battle, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Are you taking a break, too?

name: Accomplice, Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw up to 2 cards, choose 1 card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, choose up to 2 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters in your waiting room, and put them in any order into your stock.
flavorText: Just where in the world is the captive Spirit?

name: Interfering With Time, Kurumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(2)] At the beginning of your encore step, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card.
flavorText: The only one who can interfere with time is me, Kurumi Tokisaki.

name: Correspondence at Night, Kurumi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 Bond/""〈Metatron〉" Origami" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 ""〈Metatron〉" Origami" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Hypnotized Commander, Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: I'm just going to evaporate all those who went against big sister at once.

name: Perfect Cross-Dressing? Tohka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I... I am a man now.

name: Soothing Swimsuit-Over-Apron Outfits, Kotori & Yoshino
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and at the beginning of the encore step, your opponent puts that character from their memory in any position of their stage. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText:
Kotori: "Wh-What's it matter to you?"
Yoshino: "That's right. What's important is to let us help you out."

name: Stage Showdown!
text: Brainstorm If you do not have a 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. All players flip over 3 cards from the top of their decks, and put them into their waiting rooms. If the total power of the characters put into your waiting room by this effect is equal to or higher than the total power of the characters put into your opponent's waiting room by this effect, choose up to 2 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters in your waiting room, and return them to your hand.

name: "【Gungnir】"
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Here I go. Gungnir!

name: "【Yod Bet】"
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: Zaphkiel... Yod Bet.

name: "〈Gabriel〉" Miku
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if ""〈Gabriel〉"" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Shiori, I've taken a fancy to you!

name: Realized Feelings, Tohka
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Proof of Love" is in your climax area, and you have 4 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 3 damage to your opponent, look at the top card of your opponent's deck, and put it on the top of their deck or into their waiting room. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: But it's different than my love for the others... It's a love just for Shido.

name: "〈Metatron〉" Origami
text: 【CONT】 If your level is 0, and there is a blue card in your clock, this card gets -3 levels and -2 cost while in your hand. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your clock] If your level is 1 or higher, this ability does not activate. When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do not, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your clock. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of the encore step, if your level is 1 or lower, return this card to your hand.

name: Vulnerable, Tohka
text: 【ACT】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] If you have another 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, choose 1 "Proof of Love" in your waiting room, put it in your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Miku Being Seductive
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character is put into your waiting room from the stage, if this card is in your back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to its previous stage position as 【REST】.
flavorText: Darling, you're so perverted.

name: Another Me, Origami
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Tohka Being Seductive
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other "Realized Feelings, Tohka" get +2000 power. 【CONT】 All of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When your characters' trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: In a Dress, Miku
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.
flavorText: Darling, you came!

name: Aerial Battle, Origami
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 At the beginning of your encore step, if "Revenge Against Spirits" is in your climax area, this card is in your center stage, you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and there is no character facing this card or the character facing this card is 【REVERSE】, search your deck for up to 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I don't have to answer anything!

name: Innocent Bud, Tohka
text: 【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot move to another position of the stage. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: I'm so hungry, Shido!

name: Taking a Break, Miku
text: 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] If you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and draw 1 card.
flavorText: You shouldn't be talking about Natsumi like that!

name: Full of Smiles, Yoshino
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Shido's Conquest, Tohka
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Sorry to keep you waiting, Shido!

name: Regained Power, Tohka
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Tide of Battle" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, perform the following action 2 times. "Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck, your opponent chooses 1 event or character from among them, you put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."
flavorText: So... I come to kill you! Don't you die, Origami!

name: Retaliation, Origami
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 character from your stage into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into their waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: You won't get away!

name: "〈Shaddai El Chai〉" Miku
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +4000 power and +1 soul until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card direct attacks, you may choose 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: Humans are just my pawns and playthings.

name: Battle Stance, Miku
text: 【AUTO】 During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, at the beginning of your attack phase, you may put all players' characters except this card into their waiting rooms. If you do, this card gets the following 3 abilities until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +2000 power." "【CONT】 Great Performance" "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal 3 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Gabriel, Rondo!

name: Trick or Treat, Yoshino
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if you have 2 or more other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: If you don't give candy, I have to prank you...

name: Lunchtime, Miku
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card direct attacks, this card gets +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Shido's Cousin? Shiori
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other "In a Dress, Miku" get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "In a Dress, Miku", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: All right, let's go!

name: Soothing Power, Miku
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, this card gets +1000 power and +1 soul until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters you have ×500.

name: Successful Retrieval! Yoshino
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Promise to Keep a Secret, Natsumi" get the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room, and this card gets +3000 power until end of turn." 【AUTO】 Bond/"Promise to Keep a Secret, Natsumi" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Promise to Keep a Secret, Natsumi" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Cosplay Date, Miku
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters get +1000 power. 【ACT】 [(4) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to that character's soul. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Since we're finally on a date, I don't want anyone to get in the way.

name: Kinako Bread, Tohka
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Sailor Uniform, Miku
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +4000 power for each other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character in your back stage. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】."
flavorText: I came to ask you out on a date.

name: Phantom's Persuasion
text: Search your deck for up to 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Put this card into your memory.
flavorText: When the time is right, let's meet again. And then I will never let go. I won't make that mistake again.

name: "〈Gabriel〉"
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Let me tell you... Those things… They're meaningless when you face me...!

name: Proof of Love
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText: Tohka: "Shido..."

name: Revenge Against Spirits
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: I can face the Spirit that killed my mom and dad!

name: Tide of Battle
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)

name: Fall in Love Dome, Yuzuru & Kaguya
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.

name: Fall in Love Dome, Kotori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters you have ×1000.

name: Fall in Love Dome, Natsumi
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory." 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)

name: Fall in Love Dome, Tohka
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) 【REST】 2 of your 【STAND】 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 characters] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card.
flavorText: Shido!

name: Fall in Love Dome, Miku
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, search your deck for up to 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Darling!

name: White Veil, Kurumi
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Date》 or 《Celestial Spirit》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Sworn Revenge, Origami
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power and +2 soul until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if that character is a 《Celestial Spirit》 character, you may draw 1 card.
